trans-unit.source: How to build an Windows Universal app that signs users in with both personal Microsoft Account and work or school accounts.
trans-unit.target: How to build an Windows Universal app that signs users in with both personal Microsoft Account and work or school accounts.

trans-unit.source: The quick-start tutorial for Windows Universal apps isn't quite ready... Check back soon & look for updates from @AzureAD on Twitter.
trans-unit.target: The quick-start tutorial for Windows Universal apps isn't quite ready... Check back soon & look for updates from @AzureAD on Twitter.

trans-unit.source: This information applies to the v2.0 app model public preview.
trans-unit.target: This information applies to the v2.0 app model public preview.

trans-unit.source: For instructions on how to integrate with the generally available Azure AD service, please refer to the <linkText>Azure Active Directory Developer Guide</linkText><title></title>.
